metadata.title: CVE-2020-17353 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: scm/define-stencil-commands.scm in LilyPond through 2.20.0, and 2.21.xthrough 2.21.4, when -dsafe is used, lacks restrictions on embedded-ps andembedded-svg, as demonstrated by including dangerous PostScript code.

criterions.comment: lilypond package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
